mapper.insert: merge into visit V using dual on (V.visit_id = #{visitId}) when matched then update set visit_time = sysdate where sysdate - 1 <= visit_time and visit_id = #{visitId} when not matched then insert(visit_idx, visit_id, visit_time) values(#{visitIdx}, #{visitId}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(*) from visit where sysdate - 1 <= visit_time

select d.dt "date", nvl(v.cnt, 0) "count" from (select to_char((sysdate-7) + level - 1, 'YY/MM/DD') dt , to_char(to_date(sysdate-7, 'YY/MM/DD') + rownum - 1, 'day') dow from dual connect by level <= ((sysdate-1) - (sysdate-7) +1 ))d left outer join (select to_char(visit_time, 'YY/MM/DD') dt, to_char(visit_time, 'DAY') dow, count(*) cnt from visit where sysdate - visit_time <= 7 group by to_char(visit_time, 'YY/MM/DD'), to_char(visit_time, 'DAY'))v on v.dt = d.dt order by d.dt asc

select d.dt "thisMonthDate", nvl(v.cnt, 0) "thisMonthDailyCount" from (select to_char(trunc(sysdate, 'MM') + level - 1, 'YY/MM/DD') dt , to_char(to_date(trunc(sysdate, 'MM'), 'YY/MM/DD') + rownum - 1, 'month') from dual connect by level <= (last_day(sysdate) - trunc(sysdate, 'MM') +1 ))d left outer join (select to_char(visit_time, 'YY/MM/DD') dt, count(*) cnt from visit group by to_char(visit_time, 'YY/MM/DD'))v on v.dt = d.dt order by d.dt asc

select to_char((TO_DATE(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')), 'month') "thisMonth", sum("count") "thisMonthCount" from ( select d.dt "date", nvl(v.cnt, 0) "count" from (select to_char(trunc(sysdate, 'MM') + level - 1, 'YY/MM/DD') dt , to_char(to_date(trunc(sysdate, 'MM'), 'YY/MM/DD') + rownum - 1, 'month') mth from dual connect by level <= (last_day(sysdate) - trunc(sysdate, 'MM') +1 ))d left outer join (select to_char(visit_time, 'YY/MM/DD') dt, to_char(visit_time, 'DAY') dow, count(*) cnt from visit group by to_char(visit_time, 'YY/MM/DD'), to_char(visit_time, 'DAY'))v on v.dt = d.dt order by d.dt asc)

select d.mth "monthly", nvl(v.cnt, 0) "monthlyCount" from (select to_char(add_months(to_date(sysdate, 'YY/MM/DD'), - (level-1)-1), 'month') mth from dual connect by add_months(to_date(sysdate, 'YY/MM/DD'), - (level-1)-1) >= add_months(to_date(sysdate, 'YY/MM/DD'), -6) )d left outer join (select to_char(visit_time, 'month') mth, count(*) cnt from visit group by to_char(visit_time, 'month'))v on v.mth = d.mth order by lpad(d.mth, 2, '0')

select d.mth "moy", nvl(v.cnt, 0) "moyCount" from (select to_char(add_months(to_date(sysdate, 'YY/MM/DD'), - (level-1)-1), 'month') mth from dual connect by add_months(to_date(sysdate, 'YY/MM/DD'), - (level-1)-1) >= add_months(to_date(sysdate, 'YY/MM/DD'), -11) )d left outer join (select to_char(visit_time, 'month') mth, count(*) cnt from visit group by to_char(visit_time, 'month'))v on v.mth = d.mth order by lpad(d.mth, 2, '0')
